```

^Ckthxbye ![2](Images/2.png)
```

```
$ mkfifo examplepipe ![1](Images/1.png)

$ ls -l examplepipe

$ while true ; do echo "x" > examplepipe ; sleep 5 ; done & ![3](Images/3.png)
[1] 19628

$ while true ; do cat < examplepipe ; sleep 5 ; done & ![4](Images/4.png)
[2] 19636
x ![5](Images/5.png)
x
...
```
